dict.acceptation: （总称）机器；（政府等的）机关，组织；机器的运转部份；机械装置；

sent.orig: Our main production and operation of packaging machinery, printing machinery, plastics machinery, food machinery.
sent.trans: 本厂主要生产经营包装机械、印刷机械、塑料机械、食品机械。

sent.orig: Now the company main products: rubber machinery, hydraulic machinery, packaging machinery, mining machinery.
sent.trans: 现公司主要产品有：橡胶机器、液压机器、包装机器、矿山机器。

sent.orig: Major production and marketing of small two-stroke engine, garden machinery, plant protection machinery and irrigation machinery.
sent.trans: 主要生产销售小型二冲程汽油机、园林机械、植保机械以及排灌机械等。

sent.orig: And economic crop receives kind of machinery, grazing machinery and forestry machinery demand to increase apparently.
sent.trans: 而经济作物收种机械、牧草机械和林业机械需求明显增大。

sent.orig: Lamination Machinery Paper, Paper Converting Machinery, Printing Machinery, Corrugated Box Making Equipments, Punching and Embossing Press.
sent.trans: 采购产品塑封机械，纸张，转换机械，印刷机械，瓦楞纸。
